title: How to Draw Voldemort

steps.headline: Draw a circle and a half oval.
steps.description: Sketch in guidelines. This will help you draw the facial features in the next step.

steps.headline: Add important features.
steps.description: This includes Voldemort's eyes, mouth, and ears. Just put two slits for the nose. His eyes are described as being red, cat-like slits, his lips thin, and skin bloodless and pale.

steps.headline: Add in more details.
steps.description: Remember that Voldemort has no hair whatsoever.

steps.headline: Outline your drawing with permanent media such as ink or painting.
steps.description: If you want, you can also add shadows and highlights to make it more realistic. Make sure to erase all your pencil guidelines.

steps.headline: Color the drawing if you wish.
steps.description: Keep his coloring very pale and make his skin close to the color white, or very pale gray- beige.
